cab.content: Colonel Jones(This Document is the Property of /His Britannic Majesty^ Government.) 3 7Circulated by the Secretary of State for India.' K 1 1 From Viceroy, Foreign and Political Department,' 13th November 1917.(Received at India Office. 8.45 p.m.)Secret. Weekly report. North-West Frontier quiet except for continued inter-tribal fighting, in Dir and Bajaur and to raids in which one Hindu was kidnapped and another murdered.General militarv situation unchanged.secret.
